cyclone::ParticleForceGenerator Class Referenceabstract

#include <pfgen.h>

Inheritance diagram for cyclone::ParticleForceGenerator:

Public Member Functions

virtual void updateForce (Particle *particle, real duration)=0
 

Detailed Description

A force generator can be asked to add a force to one or more particles.

Member Function Documentation

◆ updateForce()

virtual void cyclone::ParticleForceGenerator::updateForce ( Particle *  particle,
real  duration 
)
pure virtual

Overload this in implementations of the interface to calculate and update the force applied to the given particle.

Implemented in cyclone::ParticleGravity, cyclone::ParticleDrag, cyclone::ParticleAnchoredSpring, cyclone::ParticleAnchoredBungee, cyclone::ParticleFakeSpring, cyclone::ParticleSpring, cyclone::ParticleBungee, cyclone::ParticleBuoyancy, and cyclone::Explosion.
